full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title

Hioki Power Quality Analyzer PQ3198-60

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-146-80176523
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-259783/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-11-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-12-09T14:00:00

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply of Hioki Power Quality Analyzers and related items under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC.

The tender requirements include:

* Two Hioki Power Quality Analyzer Kits (P/N PQ3198/60)
* Two Hioki Battery Packs (P/N Z1003)
* Two SD Memory Cards (P/N Z4003)
* Two HIOKI AC Flexible Current sensors (P/N CT7046) or equivalent

The requested delivery date for all the above-mentioned goods is no later than March 5, 2025.

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: National Defence
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Rana Hashash, rana.hashash@forces.gc.ca, (343) 572-4864

### Tender Status

The tender is open and will close on December 9, 2024 at 14:00:00. Only pre-qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

### Attachments

The tender documents can be downloaded from the CanadaBuys website:

* Tender Notice (English): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52303/w8486-259783-a_-solicitation_en.pdf
* Tender Notice (French): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52303/w8486-259783-a_-solicitation_fr.pdf

### Additional Information

For information on how to become a qualified SA Holder for future requirements and to obtain additional information regarding this SA program, please contact PSPC at steve.dumaresq@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.
